description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EnvoThemes Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.4.8.

product.name: Envo's Elementor Templates & Widgets for WooCommerce
